Trenton.Riverview Cemetery (Trenton, New Jersey): Riverview Cemetery is a cemetery located at 870 Centre Street in Trenton, in Mercer County, New Jersey, United States. The cemetery contains a number of notable people interred there, including American Civil War Union Army Major General and New Jersey Governor George B. McClellan, whose grave is marked by the tallest monument in the cemetery. His wife, Mary Ellen Marcy McClellan, is interred with him.
